law.text: All mines utilizing conveyor belts shall have one (1) or more persons to examine the conveyor belts while in operation in the mine to determine that no coal or mine refuse is being transported on the conveyor belt in a manner which would pose a threat to the health and safety of the employees or to the safety of the mine.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 258, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990.
